name: Nope (Cole Chittim)
description:
Bounce, Blast, and push the little ball around by tapping the screen in this new difficult game, Nope! A hyper casual game about bouncing a little round friend around your screen and collecting gems. With addictive tough as nails gameplay,
it's hard to put down.

● Collect as many gems as you can.

● Blast the ball around!

● Don’t let your ball bounce on the walls! Nope!

● Don’t let the ball pop! Nope!
